title: Moderate Community Forum Post
description: An inappropriate and non-constructive post has been flagged in the public community forum.

tasks.description: Review the flagged post and determine that it violates the community guidelines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the post is inappropriate.

tasks.description: Remove the post from the forum.
Send a private warning to the user who made the post, explaining the violation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the policy violation to the user.
